title: Todamont
author: Todamont
content: I'm still looking for anyone willing to part with one or more of the old 2013 BitcoinNerd "genesis block" 1g silver round commemorative tokens.from this thread 2014 thread:  [SOLD OUT] 1g Silver Round "The Genesis Block" by BitcoinNerd - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=258630.0Willing to buy or trade. Please post here or PM me if you have any and willing to do a deal! Thanks~

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I have 2x types of 1g silver rounds that I did many years ago (which the design was done by the maker of the BitcoinNerd rounds).  I'm running very low as these have become popular items suddenly, but I do have threads you can view that I will link below if you're interested in purchasing one before they run out.  Feel free to drop me a PM if you're interested.[WTS] NastyFans 1g .999 Fine Silver Collector's Rounds (2013) - 0.001 BTC[WTS] NastyPool 1g .999 Fine Silver Collector's Rounds (2014) - 0.001 BTC

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: I just bought a couple of these from you OgNasty! I recommend them. But I need a "genesis block" token or two!
